description:
At DeVry University, we are dedicated to taking innovative approaches to learning. For over 90+ years, our inclusive environment has created a platform for students to be challenged, motivated, and empowered with programs tailored to the ever-changing demands of tomorrow's tech-driven industries. 

Our DeVry Care Formula is at the core of our dedication to student success. Using data analytics and student-focused resources, we ensure our learners are supported at every step of their educational journey.  

DeVry is here to help you advance your ambition with more than 90+ degree options for associate, bachelor’s, or undergraduate certificate degree programs, as well as 35+ master’s and graduate certificate degree programs through our Keller Graduate School of Management. 

Your success is our success. Learn more at DeVry.edu 

Follow us here and on other social channels to stay updated with the latest student news, resources, tips, university updates and virtual events.   
 
Facebook: @DeVryUniversity 
LinkedIn: @DeVryUniversity 
Instagram: @DeVryUniversity 
TikTok: @DeVryUniversity 
Twitter: @DeVryUniv 
YouTube: @DeVryUniversity
name: DeVry University

similar_companies.name: DeVry University & its Keller Graduate School of Management International

updates.text: Kyle F., ‘17 DeVry alum, shares how DeVry helped prepare him to step into leadership roles. Read the full story.
We’re honored to have won the Chicago Innovation’s People’s Choice Award for our Women+Tech Scholars Program. It's exciting to be recognized for our ongoing efforts to empower women in tech.
Your success is our focus. Get 1-on-1 advisor support every step of the way. Learn more ➡️ https://devry.ly/3YmZ8IW

Plan your #career path. Download our guide for tips on goal setting. 
🔗: https://devry.ly/3Z2aVxZ #careerdevelopmentmonth

We’re excited to team up with OneTen, a network of employers creating economic mobility for diverse talent. Our partnership will award 75 scholarships to qualifying students in an eligible certificate program.

“DeVry creates an environment that empowers you to believe you can accomplish anything. It's an inspiring community to be part of.” Read alum Sherrika's story ⬇️. 

🎓: Sherrika S. - ‘08 DeVry, ‘11 and ‘13 Keller alum
Thank you to our students, alumni and all who selflessly served our country. #VeteransDay
Election Day is tomorrow. Vote and make your voice heard. 🗳️
Cassandra M., ‘12 DeVry and ‘21 Keller alum, was the first in her family to graduate college and is now a Chief Information Security Officer. Learn how DeVry encouraged her to achieve her goals.
Our Career Services are always here to support you. Join one of our 4️⃣ events this month ➡️ https://devry.ly/489C7Og
